Title = MDC2 test vectors

Availablein = legacy
Digest = MDC2
Input = "Now is the time for all "
Output = 42e50cd224baceba760bdd2bd409281a

Availablein = legacy
Digest = MDC2
Padding = 1
Input = "Now is the time for all "
Output = 42e50cd224baceba760bdd2bd409281a

Availablein = legacy
Digest = MDC2
Padding = 2
Input = "Now is the time for all "
Output = 2e4679b5add9ca7535d87afeab33bee2
